description:
Chika sees her former lover in the audience at one of their performances. The Gokudols visit a local old-fashioned café for a television appearance.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Goku Dolls no Himitsu / Densetsu no Live / Chou Ai / Soul Food / Kizu / Uramimasu
ゴクドルズの秘密 / 伝説のライブ / 超愛 / ソウルフード / キズ / 恨みます
